snippet: The West African nation of Mali, which just beat its first outbreak of Ebola, has confirmed a second one that is larger and more threatening, global health authorities said on Wednesday.
abstract: West African nation of Mali, which beat its first outbreak of Ebola, confirms second one that is larger and more threatening; new cases will add to the mounting total of Ebola victims.

byline.contributor: Katarina Höije and Cheick Diouara contributed reporting from Bamako, Mali.

lead_paragraph: The West African nation of Mali, which just beat its first outbreak of Ebola, has confirmed a second one that is larger and more threatening, global health authorities said on Wednesday.

headline.main: Second Ebola Outbreak in Mali Eclipses Early Success
headline.print_headline: Outbreak in Mali Eclipses Early Success
